LanguageData.Bombardier.label: Bombardier
LanguageData.Bombardier.description: Bombardiers are not particularly dangerous when alone, but they can be very dangerous when in packs. It is a social creature that cannot reproduce individually.
LanguageData.Bombardier.verbs.0.label: launch Acid
LanguageData.Bombardier.tools.0.label: Left foreleg
LanguageData.Bombardier.tools.1.label: Right foreleg
LanguageData.Bombardier.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Huntercarab.label: Huntercarab
LanguageData.Huntercarab.description: A large, genetically-engineered Insect. Once the worker caste of an artificial ecosystem of insectoids designed to fight mechanoid invasions, it is now often seen without its deadlier insectoid cousins. Still, its size and hard shell make it dangerous when it attacks. A eusocial creature, it cannot reproduce individually.
LanguageData.Huntercarab.tools.0.label: mandibles
LanguageData.Huntercarab.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.QueenBug.label: Queen Bug
LanguageData.QueenBug.description: A rare representative of insectoids, there are legends that the destroyed settlements full of beetles are the work of the paws of Myasnaya Zina.
LanguageData.QueenBug.verbs.0.label: launch Cocon
LanguageData.QueenBug.tools.0.label: Left foreleg
LanguageData.QueenBug.tools.1.label: Right foreleg
LanguageData.QueenBug.tools.3.label: head
